Subskills.name: Heavy Water
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by tsunami.

Subskills.name: Arctic Aqua
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict frostbite on hit.

Subskills.name: Trembling Tidalwave
Subskills.description: Increases the width of tsunami knocking monsters up dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Water Walker
Subskills.description: Gain increased movement speed for a short duration when using tsunami.

Subskills.name: Ramping Waves
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by tsunami over time.

Subskills.name: Waterspout
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a burst of water on hit dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Chaining Waves
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using tsunami.

Subskills.name: Salt Balance
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frostbitten targets.

Subskills.name: The Last Water Bender
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of tsunami inflicting cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Asphyxiating Depths
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Beyond the Horizon
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of tsunami decreasing its projectile speed.

Subskills.name: Ocean Pullback
Subskills.description: Tsunami waves return back to you with increased damage and size.
